name: UIPM USA
bossPosition: Executive Member of Presidential Advisory Board
goal:
UIPM (Universal Institute of Professional Management) is the higher education which applies a 100% online learning system, and UIPM is an affiliate of Coursera provides online access to the worldâ€™s best education, from top universities like Yale, Johns Hopkins, Michigan, and top companies like Google, Microsoft, etc. UIPM is an affiliate of Blockchain Council is an authoritative group of subject experts who are evangelizing Blockchain Research & Development, Use Cases and knowledge for the better world. We are an online education platform, educating people in Blockchain technology. And UIPM is an affiliate of InformIT is home to technology publishers Addison-Wesley Professional, Cisco Press, IBM Press, Pearson Certification, QUE & Sams. We publish the top books, eBooks, & video from the creators, innovators & leaders of technology.

Aims to create professional scholars in their respective fields. And can become a professional leadership in managing organizations, companies, etc.

Essentially the definition of management is to regulate activities or a movement aimed at achieving harmonization. Because everything without management will never get a harmonious result, automatically gets a significant success. UIPM has unlimited study programs, because UIPM teaches management science that is universal, its existence is in all faculties.

UIPM concentrates on professional management education, because this education is the center in managing and creating success in all fields of science and aspects of life. Professional management is a field of science that is needed by all disciplines. This means that management knowledge exists in every field of science. Management science is human nature.

UIPM in implementing professional education. UIPM is looking for talented students or students who love a field that can benefit themselves and others. From this we can direct and guide students who are automatically talented they will be active in pursuing their education because it is in accordance with his love of majors in accordance with his talents.

For this reason, UIPM in collaboration with Coursera Program is a provider that implements an expertise education system or what is called a Skills Certification. This education system is collaborated with higher education study programs. So that graduates who have graduated from UIPM can directly work in companies or become successful entrepreneurs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
UIPM USA, focuses on the areas of interest developed by the following European Union policies:

- Education
- Humanitarian aid
- Finding solutions to migratory pressures
- The fight against climate change in the European Union
